title: Launch
custom_preconds: Given At Bat and Android Auto apps are both installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the phone is connected via USB

When Android Auto is launched 
And the user taps on the headphones icon on the bottom bar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then At Bat will open 
And the user will receive a welcome message

title: Entitlement
custom_preconds: Given At Bat and Android Auto apps are both installed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When At Bat is open in Android Auto
And the user isn't logged into an account
Or the user is logged into an account that doesn't have audio access
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive a message that audio access is required

custom_steps_separated.content:
When At Bat is open in Android Auto
And the user is logged into an entitled account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive a message stating how many games are available when applicable

title: List of Games
custom_preconds: Given At Bat and Android Auto apps are both installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user looks at the list of available games
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the games will be sorted as follows:
favorite teams > in progress games > games that haven't started yet

title: Screen Controls
custom_preconds: Given At Bat and Android Auto apps are both installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the Play button with a favorite team selected in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's favorite team's audio feed will launch
And if the user's favorite team isn't active
Then the first game in the list will play

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the Stop button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the audio feed will pause

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the next track button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the audio feed will change stations

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the previous track button after changing feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the previous audio feed

title: Voice Control Microphone
custom_preconds: Given At Bat and Android Auto apps are both installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the voice control microphone
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the current feed will pause
And the user will be able to speak commands

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the voice control microphone
And the user says, 'Play {team name}'
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will switch to the default feed for that team when applicable

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user says, 'Play {city name} {team name}'
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will switch to the default feed for that team when applicable
Then the feed will not change
Then the feed will switch to the next station
Then the feed will switch to the previous station
